name: com.ltd-profit.unity.omega-package
description:
The package contains a number of types that help accelerate product development. The package contains:
- Extensions for asynchronous programming in Unity as Routine (Omega.Routines)
- The system of global events (Omega.Events) allows you to conveniently organize the logic of the application.
- A number of utilities for working with the built-in Unity and BCL types, such as GameObject, BoxCollider, Vector3, Color, Type, etc.
- Extensions of existing types (e.g. MissingComponents for GameObject)
author: Ltd. ProfIT (https://github.com/ltd-profit/omega-package)
